akka.persistence.typed.scaladsl

Interface ReplyEffect<Event,State>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Effect<Event,State>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeEffect, EffectImpl, Persist, PersistAll, PersistNothing$, Unhandled$

    public interface ReplyEffect<Event,State>
extends Effect<Event,State>
    PersistentBehavior.withEnforcedReplies can be used to enforce that replies are not forgotten. Then there will be compilation errors if the returned effect isn't a ReplyEffect, which can be created with Effect.reply, Effect.noReply, Effect.thenReply, or Effect.thenNoReply.

    Not intended for user extension.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface akka.persistence.typed.scaladsl.Effect

        andThen, andThen, events, thenNoReply, thenReply, thenRun, thenStop
